00071 class NTBP_membrane_compartment_o : public NTBP_object_o {
00072 public:
00073 /***   Constructors, Copy/Assignment and Destructor  ***/  
00074 NTBP_membrane_compartment_o(NTreal area /* in muMeter^2 */);
00075 NTBP_membrane_compartment_o(const NTBP_membrane_compartment_o & original);
00076 const NTBP_membrane_compartment_o & operator= (const NTBP_membrane_compartment_o & right);
00077 virtual ~NTBP_membrane_compartment_o();
00078 /* ***  Methods              ***/
00079 NTreturn AttachCurrent(NTBP_membrane_current_o * currentPtr, NTBPcurrentType type);
00080 NTreturn Step(NTreal newVM /* mV */ );
00081 NTreturn InjectCurrent(NTreal current /* in nA */);
00082 NTreal AttachedCurrent(NTsize currentIndex){NT_ASSERT((currentIndex > 0) && (currentIndex-1 < currentVec.size())); return currentVec[currentIndex-1]->_current();}
00083 NTreal AttachedConductance(NTsize currentIndex){NT_ASSERT((currentIndex > 0) && (currentIndex-1 < currentVec.size())); return currentVec[currentIndex-1]->_conductance();}
00084 NTreal AttachedReversalPotential(NTsize currentIndex){NT_ASSERT((currentIndex > 0) && (currentIndex-1 < currentVec.size())); return currentVec[currentIndex-1]->_reversalPotential();}
00086 NTreal TimeConstant(){ return (_cM()/TotalConductance())*_area()*1.0e8; }
00087 const NTBP_membrane_current_o * Current(NTsize currentIndex){NT_ASSERT((currentIndex > 0) && (currentIndex-1 < currentVec.size())); return currentVec[currentIndex-1];}
00088 /* in muMeter^2 */
00089 NTreal _area()  /* in muMeter^2 */const { return area; }
00090 /* in mV */
00091 NTreal _vM() /* in mV muMeter */ const { return vM; }
00093 void Set_cM( NTreal newCm /* in muF / cm^2 */ ) { cM = newCm;  compartmentMembraneCapacitance = CompartmentMembraneCapacitance(); }
00094 /* in muF / cm^2 */
00095 NTreal _cM() const { return cM; }
00097 void Set_rA( NTreal newRa /* in Ohm cm */ ) { rA = newRa;}
00098 /* in Ohm cm */
00099 NTreal _rA() const { return rA; }
00100 /* Set temperature [Celsius] in compartment and for all currents within compartment (affects future attached ones also) */
00101 NTreturn Set_temperature(NTreal newTemp /* in Celsius */) { temperature = newTemp; for (NTsize i = 0; i < currentVec.size(); i++) currentVec[i]->Set_temperature(newTemp); return NT_SUCCESS;}
00102 /* in Celsius */
00103 NTreal _temperature() const { return temperature;}
00104 /* in muF */
00105 NTreal _compartmentMembraneCapacitance() const { return compartmentMembraneCapacitance; }
00106 /* in muF */
00107 NTreal CompartmentMembraneCapacitance() const;
00108 /* in nA */
00109 NTreal CompartmentMembraneNetCurrent() const;
00111 NTreal CompartmentChannelStateTimeConstant() const;
00113 bool GillespieStep();
00115 void ShowParam() const;
00116 /* ***  Data                 ***/
00117 protected:
00118 /* ***  Methods              ***/
00119 NTreal  TotalConductance() const;
00120 NTreal  WeightedConductance() const;// OBSOLETE?
00121 /* ***  Data                 ***/
00122 NTreal vM; // membrane voltage in mV
00123 NTreal iInj; // injected current into compartment in nA
00124 vector< NTBP_membrane_current_o * > currentVec;
00125 private:
00126 /* ***  Methods              ***/
00127 NTreal cM; // membrane capacity in muFarad/cm^2
00128 NTreal rA; // axoplasmatic resistance in Ohm cm
00129 NTreal area; // in muMeter^2
00130 NTreal temperature; // in Celsius
00131 NTreal compartmentMembraneCapacitance; // in muFarad
00132 /* ***  Data                 ***/
00133 };
